title: Punxsutrendy Phil 2/2: Groundhog Day, 'Jackass Forever', Texas Book Ban, Jeff Zucker, 'Cancel Spotify', Tesla
itunes:title: Punxsutrendy Phil 2/2: Groundhog Day, 'Jackass Forever', Texas Book Ban, Jeff Zucker, 'Cancel Spotify', Tesla
description:
In this edition of Punxsutrendy Phil, Jack and super producer Becca discuss Groundhog Day (not the movie), the return of comedy to the big screen with 'Jackass Forever', Texas banning books that explore topics relating to reality, Jeff Zucker resigning from CNN over literal fuckery, the 'Cancel Spotify' movement, and the myriad issues with Tesla

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
